quotes.heading: In His Own Words

quote1.text: Privacy is a fundamental human right. Without it, there is no freedom. Governments want you to believe you need to give up privacy for security, but that's a fallacy.

quote2.text: Governments are the greatest threat to human freedom in history. They operate using fear to control. Trust no system that requires your submission.

quote3.text: Cryptocurrencies are the first line of defense against monetary tyranny. Decentralized digital money will eliminate central banks' control over our lives.

timeline.title: The McAfee Timeline
timeline.subtitle: The remarkable journey of a technology pioneer and freedom advocate

1945.title: Born on September 18
1945.description: John David McAfee was born in the United Kingdom on a US Army base.

1987.title: Founded McAfee Associates
1987.description: Created the first commercial antivirus software and distributed it as shareware.

2010.title: Moved to Belize
2010.description: Relocated to Belize to pursue interests in antibiotics derived from jungle plants.

2016.title: Ran for US President
2016.description: Ran for the Libertarian Party nomination for President of the United States.

2019.title: Living in Exile
2019.description: Announced he was living in exile due to tax issues with the US government.

2021.title: Passed Away
2021.description: Found dead in a Spanish prison at the age of 75, hours after his extradition to the US was approved.
